## blockRendering.JaggedEdge class

An object containing information about the jagged edge of a collapsed block takes up during rendering

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JaggedEdge extends Measurable 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Measurable

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `JaggedEdge` class.
